name: Xe Om Adventure to Tam Giang Lagoon
description:
7:30am: Get
your helmet and comfortably ride on the back of your “Xe Om” driver to Thanh Toan tile-roofed bridge to visit
one of the oldest bridges with distinctive architecture in Vietnam and learn how
to use the farming tools at Thanh Toan
Museum near by. On the way, we will have a quick stop at the temple of Thanh Thuy Chanh Village to
learn something about the history and culture of this area and especially the Ngo family’s temple to understand how
they treasure the tradition of worshiping and paying tribute to their ancestors.
Breakfast is served along with drink at a local restaurant.
